flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

lines.text: Current Status of BeamMaker. The printer uses a standard projector
lines.text_raw: Current Status of BeamMaker. The printer uses a standard projector

guide.summary: BeamMaker is A new Open Source Photopolymer 3D printer. The printer uses 3D printing material of public domain and it is constructed over the basis of inexpensive materials. A simple projector is used for producing the printing patterns. At the moment we
